summary: Adds an arming sword to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Adds an arming sword to Skyrim. It can be found in Bloodlet Throne behind the throne above the small fighting arena thing. It can also be crafted, sharpened, and enchanted.

This is tagged as a mod resource, if you don't like the textures then by all means redo them to suit you and upload your version. Would make a good sword for city guards as well or if you made a follower that likes things simple and effective. No permission required, just credits for all assets you use.

Skyrim SE version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/7889] Bloodlet Blade [/url]

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Versions and update info:[/size][/color][/b]

V1.0 Initial release

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Compatibility and required files:[/size][/color][/b]

Requires: Skyrim.

Mod compatibilities: May be incompatible with anything that changes the same location.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/b]

Use NMM or the individual downloads or...

Manual for individual files:
1. Unzip/unrar to any location.
2. Copy contents into your Data folder.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Mod Use Permission: [/size][/color][/b]

Mod Authors: Feel free to use in your mod, retexture, whatever as long as you don't sell it. Requires credits.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Credits: [/size][/color][/b]

Bethesda and me.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]My other mods....[/size][/color][/b]

[spoiler]
